abstract: Akio Toyoda was originally supposed to hop a Lexus to his hotel during this week’s visit to Michigan. But the new president of Toyota changed that plan when a different car caught his eye.
snippet: Akio Toyoda was originally supposed to hop a Lexus to his hotel during this week’s visit to Michigan. But the new president of Toyota changed that plan when a different car caught his eye.
lead_paragraph: From Micheline Maynard, a DealBook colleague:

headline.main: Toyota Chief Tries a New Ride in U.S. Tour

abstract: The new model is not expected to be a high-volume seller but will add some excitement to the automaker’s current conservative lineup.
snippet: The new model is not expected to be a high-volume seller but will add some excitement to the automaker’s current conservative lineup.
lead_paragraph: TRAVERSE CITY, Mich.  The president of Toyota Motor, Akio Toyoda, said on Wednesday that his company would introduce an affordable sports car in the United States as part of an effort to inject more passion into Toyota’s conservative lineup.

headline.main: Toyota Plans a U.S. Sports Car, With Passion
headline.print_headline: Toyota Plans a Sports Car, With Passion
